pretty.translation[0].definitions[0].def: fairly or more than a little
pretty.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I’m pretty sure he’ll say yes.
pretty.translation[0].definitions[0].not: In written English, people usually avoid pretty and use fairly instead:
The consequences of this are fairly obvious.
pretty.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Dinner at Luigi’s sounds pretty good to me.
pretty.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face
pretty.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
pretty.translation[1].definitions[1].def: something that is pretty is pleasant to look at or listen to but is not impressive
